title.value: Сортовые особенности картофеля и их использование в кулинарии и перерабатывающей промышленности
Varietal potato features and their use in cookery and processing industry

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Nezakonova, O.B., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: Results of assessment of potato (Solanum tuberosum) varieties on their suitability for processing into frozen potato are presented in the article. The research objective was to identify the factors affecting the quality of frozen potato and select varieties that meet the requirements of the processing industry for the required type of potato, as well as to select varieties with high taste of boiled potato tubers grown in different types of soil and variety standards of culinary types. It was established that weather conditions during growing period significantly influenced on the quality of frozen potato. Varieties with high taste quality of boiled potato and standards for culinary types A, B, C are distinguished when the potato is grown on the different type of soils. Varietal characteristics had the greatest impact on the quality of frozen potato (share of influence - 19.8%), the share effect of the interaction of factors 'variety x meteorological conditions' was 10.9%, the factors 'variety x soil type
